thread.section_title: PropertyNow Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PropertyNow | propertynow.com.au
thread.title: Grant Atherton

author: Grant Atherton
title: Grant Atherton
text:
Using Property Now was the easiest and most convenient way to sell our home. (And also the cheapest). The whole set up was simple and the service by the team to answer any questions was outstanding.
We sold our place within 10 days and $10k above our top price range. And everyone we showed through the house loved the idea of speaking to the owner. They actually said they preferred it.
So thanks Property Now for everything.
